title: Lesvos: The 8-year-old boy who was electrocuted in a park gained the battle for all times – 2024-06-22 17:17:25
text:
The 8-year-old who suffered an electrical shock from a present leak in a light-weight pole in a municipal park within the village of Kato Tritos, Mytilini, returned to his house final evening. There have been many kids within the park, which additionally hosts a 5X5 subject.
The kid was taken to the hospital final evening and handled as a precaution for monitoring within the Intensive Care Unit. The municipality of Mytilini confirmed the leak, from cables inside a metallic electrical lighting pole, and the electrical energy provide was interrupted to revive the issue.
The mayor of Mytilini requested the municipality’s crews to right away begin checking all related public constructions, parks, squares, stadiums with a view to restore current damages and keep away from related incidents.
